content.question: Which of the following best describes the authorâ€™s main argument in the passage?

choices.label: The global market was increasingly dominated by trading monopolies that controlled the distribution of luxury goods.
The global market increasingly featured market competition among various luxury and bulk goods.
The global market did not feature European goods in any significant quantity.
The global market was largely dominated by Asian export economies.

content.answer: The global market increasingly featured market competition among various luxury and bulk goods.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
